<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lets Talk about</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Läßt sich befassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Laisse parler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deixa a conversa aproximadamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lascia per parlare di</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφήνει τη συζήτηση για</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Deja para hablar</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students carry out role- play using basic vocabulary in different topics.. Includes an assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">social interation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer Rolle Spiel mit grundlegendem Wortschatz in den 
unterschiedlichen Themen durchführen. Enthält eine 
Einschätzung Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants effectuent le jeu de rôle en utilisant le vocabulaire de 
base dans différents sujets. Inclut une rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes realizem o jogo do papel usando o vocabulário básico em 
tópicos diferentes. Inclui um rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli
allievi effettuano il gioco di ruolo usando il vocabolario di base nei
soggetti differenti. Include una rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές εκτελούν το ρόλο - παίζει τη χρησιμοποίηση του 
βασικού λεξιλογίου στα διαφορετικά θέματα .. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes realizan el juego del papel usando vocabulario básico
en diversos asuntos. Incluye una rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialinteration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
